global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Eeastern Boundary (EB) line 2019-12-13 01:04:47 UTC and recovered 2020-03-03 12:00 UTC for a total of 81 days spent at sea. The glider experienced a digifin leak on 2020-02-22 and was put in surface drift mode until it was recovered.

platform.long_name: OOI Costal Pioneer 200m Slocum Glider cp_340
